channel.title: Comments on: I made a British petrol station during a fuel shortage in Far Cry 5!

item.title: By: mojoswoptops2020
item.dc:creator: mojoswoptops2020
item.description: This one took around 2 hours to build, here's a video showing how I put all the pieces together! https://youtu.be/RJbLtpmHHCw

item.title: By: DenzilMySon

item.description: You need to add the woman filling 2 litre bottles with petrol. After she poured out the water.

item.title: By: madrid_357
item.dc:creator: madrid_357
item.description:
Always beautiful what you do.
Would be cool to see the 007 Nightfire map in the castle but not only as just a beautiful picture, nah, it should be playable too.
item.content:encoded:
Always beautiful what you do.

Would be cool to see the 007 Nightfire map in the castle but not only as just a beautiful picture, nah, it should be playable too.

item.title: By: Oni_of_the_North
item.dc:creator: Oni_of_the_North
item.description: This is the weirdest ad for Tescos ever.
item.content:encoded: This is the weirdest ad for Tescos ever.

item.title: By: Grim_Scotsman
item.dc:creator: Grim_Scotsman
item.description: Mate, that looks a lot like a tesco petrol station in Corstorphine. Is it actually or just a mad coincidence?
item.content:encoded: Mate, that looks a lot like a tesco petrol station in Corstorphine. Is it actually or just a mad coincidence?

item.title: By: GameShill
item.dc:creator: GameShill
item.description: The level editor in that game is amazing.
item.content:encoded: The level editor in that game is amazing.

item.title: By: TheFlawedAudio
item.dc:creator: TheFlawedAudio
item.description: As someone who works part-time at a petrol station, I greatly appreciate the accuracy.
item.content:encoded: As someone who works part-time at a petrol station, I greatly appreciate the accuracy.

item.title: By: space0watch
item.dc:creator: space0watch
item.description: I legit thought this was a real picture and wondered what it was doing in the PS4 sub! That is some wacky stuff though. Sad that it's real. Edit: By real I mean the shortages and riots etc.
item.content:encoded: I legit thought this was a real picture and wondered what it was doing in the PS4 sub! That is some wacky stuff though. Sad that it’s real. Edit: By real I mean the shortages and riots etc.
